Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Walter A. Spelyng "Zzzz"
Reviews.Content: This is a great point and shoot camera. I've taken some great shots in the auto mode. The Tele. lense helps on getting close up's on long shots. And maybe the best part it is easy to use and understand. In auto, you simply point, shoot and get a gerat shot.  I have not tried the manual settings, maybe because so far I've taken great shots in auto.  All in all, it was exactly what I was looking for, and the price was right. Also the included accessories were a bonus. The delivery was fast. An excellent supplier. I would purchase from them again.
